FOLDER.name: Budget to Actual and Other Financial Reports
FOLDER.description: Data is available for cost centers to which you have been granted security access. Reports are available at any time. New data is added on a monthly basis on the 11th business day each month.
FOLDER.path: /Budget to Actual and Other Financial Reports

REPORT.name: Budget to Actual
REPORT.description: YTD comparison of actual expenditures to budget with drill down to transaction detail.

REPORT.name: Budget To Actual - Excel Only
REPORT.description: Summary of grants containing payout information by year and by commitment level, including existing commitments from prior years, new commitments in current year, and new potential opportunities by their forecasted approval year.

REPORT.name: Budget To Actual by Month
REPORT.description: Month comparison of actual expenditures to budget with drill down to transaction detail.

REPORT.name: Budget To Actual by Month - Excel Only
REPORT.description: Month comparison of actual expenditures to budget with drill down to transaction detail. Excel version.

REPORT.name: Transaction Detail
REPORT.description: Provides a list of transactions based on user selection. Options include search by cost center, account, project and vendor

REPORT.name: Budget to Actual - Transaction Detail
REPORT.description: ***HIDDEN*** Budget to actual sub-report.

REPORT.name: Budget to Actual by Month Cost Center Detail
REPORT.description: ***HIDDEN*** Budget to actual sub-report.

REPORT.name: Budget to Actual by Month Cost Center Detail - Excel Only
REPORT.description: ***HIDDEN*** Budget to actual sub-report. Excel version.

REPORT.name: Budget to Actual Cost Center Detail
REPORT.description: ***HIDDEN*** Budget to actual sub-report.

REPORT.name: Budget to Actual Cost Center Detail - Excel Only
REPORT.description: ***HIDDEN*** Budget to actual sub-report. Excel version.

REPORT.name: Contract Payment Reconciliation Report - Detailed
REPORT.description: The main objective of the reconciliation report is to highlight any discrepancies between the recording of contract payments in Contract Management and Great Plains. Each system is updated separately through manual processes and therefore, there is the chance that it may be entered differently in one of the systems. Report users must be presented with a convenient report for comparing contract payment records in both systems, highlighting any differences.

REPORT.name: Contract Payment Reconciliation Report -Detailed-New Format
REPORT.description: The main objective of the reconciliation report is to highlight any discrepancies between the recording of contract payments in Contract Management and Great Plains. Each system is updated separately through manual processes and therefore, there is the chance that it may be entered differently in one of the systems. Report users must be presented with a convenient report for comparing contract payment records in both systems, highlighting any differences.

REPORT.name: Contract Request List Report
REPORT.description: Contract Request List Report

REPORT.name: Contract Detail Report
REPORT.description: Displays all of the contract information including a list of payments made.

REPORT.name: Payment Reconciliation Summary
REPORT.description: Identify Unison payment data that needs to be reconciled with Great Plains.

REPORT.name: Payment Reconciliation Summary - Excel
REPORT.description: Excel version to identify Unison payment data that needs to be reconciled with Great Plains.

REPORT.name: Payment Reconciliation Detail
REPORT.description: A report used to view payment information between CRM and Great Plains grouped by GL Account Code with details at the payment level. This report flags any discrepancies in red.

FOLDER.name: 990 Tax Reports
FOLDER.description: All internal and external 990 Tax reports.

REPORT.name: Opportunity Commitments
REPORT.description: Prepare for audit by identifying opportunities that have been countersigned and have an outstanding balance.

REPORT.name: Opportunity Commitments - Excel
REPORT.description: This Excel report in preparation for the audit. This Excel report shows Opportunities where the Approved Date is as of the specified date where the Outstanding Balance is positive.This Excel report displays amounts as of 12/31 for the specified year and payment amounts by year.

REPORT.name: Expenditure Responsibility
REPORT.description: Display information about Expenditure Responsibility opportunities for the 990-PF tax form.

REPORT.name: Expenditure Responsibility E-FILE
REPORT.description: Drill-Through reports such as "Payments Recommended Date Past Due" and "Payments Upcomming". List of requirements associated to a given opportunity and payment. This report has been rationalized with the ability to override the report name to fit the parent report.

REPORT.name: Opportunities Approved for Future Payment
REPORT.description: Provide opportunity data needed for IRS form 990-PF.

REPORT.name: Opportunities Approved for Future Payment E-FILE
REPORT.description: This is an internal report used to send E-File version Opportunities Approved for Future Payment Report for tax filing activities. This report uses data captured at year-end in conjunction with current information to allow Finance to accurately capture amounts while allowing them to appropriately update information such as the Opportunity Description.

REPORT.name: Expenditure Responsibility Grantee Spend
REPORT.description: Subreport of Expenditure Responsibility. Displays Grantee Spend line items.

REPORT.name: Expenditure Responsibility Payment Detail
REPORT.description: Subreport of Expenditure Responsibility. Displays Grantee payment line items.

REPORT.name: Opportunities Paid
REPORT.description: List sum of payments by Opportunity and Package for IRS form 990-PF.

REPORT.name: Opportunities Paid E-FILE
REPORT.description: This is an internal report used to send E-File version Opportunities Paid Report for tax filing activities.

FOLDER.name: Unison Reports
FOLDER.description: Centralized repository for Unison Managed Reports

REPORT.name: Payments Recommended Date Past Due
REPORT.description: Assess whether an amendment package is needed because a payment was moved past the payment's Recommended Date.

REPORT.name: Requirement Detail
REPORT.description: List of requirements associated to a given opportunity and payment.

REPORT.name: Payments Upcoming
REPORT.description: View a detailed list of upcoming payments, including whether or not there are related requirements for each payment.

REPORT.name: Opportunities Approved
REPORT.description: Identify all opportunities where the agreement package was approved (awarded) in a specified timeframe, grouped by Foundation Organization or Strategy.
REPORT.technicalDescription: Grand Total for Opportunity Total Amount is a sum of total amount for Distinct Opportunities. Sub-Total shows sum of total strategy amount by strategy or program and count of distinct opportunities associated with strategy or program

REPORT.name: Opportunities Approved - Excel
REPORT.description: Excel export version of Opportunities Approved

REPORT.name: Opportunities Close Required
REPORT.description: Identify opportunities that should be closed.

REPORT.name: Requirement Detail
REPORT.description: List of requirements associated to a given opportunity and payment.

REPORT.name: Approvals Required by Approver
REPORT.description: Manage payment and/or package approvals in order to plan workload for approvers.

REPORT.name: Approvals Required by Approver - Excel
REPORT.description: This Excel report provides users the ability to identify the number of grants, and their associated payout amounts that have upcoming approvals. Users may filter by Strategy, Foundation Organization, Approver, or Activity status. Report will returns approvals on packages, payments, or both. The report can be used to plan workload for Program Officers.

REPORT.name: Approvals Required by Approver Detail
REPORT.description: This report is being used in meetings with Approvers to discuss upcoming approvals and to manage their workload

REPORT.name: Approvals Required by Approver Detail - Excel
REPORT.description: This report is being used in meetings with Approvers to discuss upcoming approvals and to manage their workload

REPORT.name: Requirements By Owner
REPORT.description: Identify upcoming grantee requirements and related payment information, organized by opportunity owner.

REPORT.name: Requirements By Owner - Excel
REPORT.description: Excel Export Version of Requirements By Owner

REPORT.name: Workload Detail
REPORT.description: The Workload Detail report lists out the detailed Approval Tasks, Review Tasks and Requirement information needed for an entire opportunity, broken out by row for each individual task.

REPORT.name: Workload Summary
REPORT.description: Manage package and/or payment approvals, reviews, and requirements for committed and potential opportunities with payments in current or future years, grouped by New Grants and Subsequent Payments.

REPORT.name: Current Year Payout Forecast by Paid - Unpaid - Potential
REPORT.description: Compare existing and forecasted commitments to budgeted payout targets, grouping payment data by Paid, Unpaid, and Potential categories to help manage short-term grant payout.

REPORT.name: Current Year Payout Forecast by New and Subsequent
REPORT.description: Compare existing and forecasted commitments to budgeted payout targets, with amounts broken out by New Grants and Subsequent Payments categories, to help manage short- term grant payout.

REPORT.name: Initiative Monthly Payout by Paid - Unpaid - Potential
REPORT.description: For a specified year, view commitment details by month, grouped by Paid, Unpaid and Potential categories, for management of grant payout.

REPORT.name: Initiative Monthly Payout by New and Subsequent
REPORT.description: For a specified year, view commitment details by month, grouped by New Grants and Subsequent Payments categories, for management of grant payout.

REPORT.name: Quarterly Payout Targets by Paid - Unpaid - Potential
REPORT.description: View grant payout and budgeted targets in quarterly format, with payments grouped by Paid, Unpaid and Potential categories.

REPORT.name: Quarterly Detail Report by New and Subsequent
REPORT.description: View grant payout by quarter against budgeted targets for New Grants, Subsequent Payments, or Total Grant payouts.

REPORT.name: 4 Year Outlook - Excel Only
REPORT.description: Provide easy-to-export version of 4 Year Outlook.

REPORT.name: Initiative Yearly Payout - 4 Year Outlook
REPORT.description: View existing and forecasted commitment details for current year and next three years, for management of grant payout over multiple years.

REPORT.name: Initiative Monthly Payout by New and Subsequent - Excel Only
REPORT.description: Provide easy-to-export version of Initiative Monthly Payout by New and Subsequent.

REPORT.name: Initiative Monthly Payout by Paid - Unpaid - Potential - Excel Only
REPORT.description: Provide easy-to-export version of Initiative Monthly Payout by Paid-Unpaid-Potential.

REPORT.name: 4 Year Outlook
REPORT.description: Compare existing and forecasted commitments to budgeted payout targets for current and future years, to help manage long-term grant payout.
REPORT.technicalDescription: Budgeted Payout Target values displayed for future years include Grants and Direct Charitable Expense portions of Budget from the annual plan. Values included in Total Forecasted Payout include grant-related amounts only; contract-related amounts and forecasts for other DCE expenses such as convenings must be manually reconciled from ICS and other financial systems.

REPORT.name: Initiative Yearly Payout
REPORT.description: View existing and forecasted commitment details, based on selected commitment year(s), for multi-year management of grant payout.
